description: The app never connects, the appimage works fine though

Ignore the 1 star reviews, those folks didn't pay attention to the Linux FAQ. You just need to enable a few permissions and everything works fine. 

Awesome idea though, the app is so awesome, it emulates working in person at an office super effectively!

The only issue is if you're using Wayland instead of XOrg you may have issues with screen sharing.

No matter what i do or which installation method i use; snap, ubuntu software, or the download from the website. Nothing happens , I'm greeted with a blank white screen. 

Ubuntu 20.04 with both a standalone system install and a virtualbox instance with windows host.

Ignore the 1 star reviews, on Linux just need to enable some permissions and it works as expected, lot of one star reviews clearly didnt read the FAQ for Linux.

Really easy to use, especially sharing screen, so much better than other offerings out there. Gives idea of whats going on with people via apps and it intergrtes well with many apps and slack.
summary: Great app, no hassle to use
